info.name: Movies CAD IT
info.description: Movie REST API for QA Assessment

item.name: All Endpoint (Please exclude this folder while running test)

request.description: Getting all movies with customization order and offset. The request limited to only show 100 data

response.name: Get All Movies

request.description: Getting a specific movie to get its detail information

response.name: Get Movie Detail
response.body:
{
    "status": "Success",
    "message": "Success",
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "movies": "The Hitman's Bodyguard",
        "year": "-2017",
        "genre": "\nAction, Comedy, Crime            ",
        "rating": "6.9",
        "one_line": "\nThe world's top bodyguard gets a new client, a hitman who must testify at the International Criminal Court. They must put their differences aside and work together to make it to the trial on time.",
        "stars": "\n    Director:\nPatrick Hughes\n| \n    Stars:\nRyan Reynolds, \nSamuel L. Jackson, \nGary Oldman, \nElodie Yung\n",
        "votes": "205,979",
        "runtime": "118",
        "gross": "$75.47M"
    }
}
